message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,700,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While your offer is tempting, I value this product at a premium. Would you consider meeting halfway at $1,650,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,580,000. I'm trying to be fair, but I need to make sure the price fits within my budget.
